table_description: quote lines represent individual items or services included in a quote or price proposal. They are the building blocks of a quote, detailing the specific products, quantities, prices, and other relevant information for each line. Quote lines can be either product-based, where the quoted value is determined by the quantity and price of a product, or project-based, where the quoted value is determined by estimated work and resources.

table_columns.name: amount
table_columns.description: Quantity or amount of the product or service in the quote line.

table_columns.name: comment
table_columns.description: Additional notes or comments about the quote line item.

table_columns.name: cost
table_columns.description: Cost value associated with the quote line item.

table_columns.name: custom_fields
table_columns.description: Custom field values associated with the quote line.

table_columns.name: dates
table_columns.description: Date information related to the quote line item.

table_columns.name: discount
table_columns.description: DONT USE THIS COLUMN FOR ANYTHING. IN QUERY

table_columns.description: Indicator if the quote line has been confirmed (e.g., 1 for confirmed, 0 for not confirmed).

table_columns.description: Unit price for the product or service in this line item. important column for query

table_columns.description: Identifier for the product associated with this line item.

table_columns.name: product_name
table_columns.description: Name of the product or service in this line item.

table_columns.name: project_id
table_columns.description: Identifier for the project associated with this quote line. we need use this in join

table_columns.name: project_name

table_columns.name: quote_id

table_columns.description: Total sum for this line item (typically price Ã— amount).

table_columns.description: Identifier for the supplier of the product or service in this line.

table_columns.name: supplier_name
table_columns.description: Name of the supplier for this line item.

table_columns.name: unit
table_columns.description: Unit of measurement for the product or service (e.g., hours, pieces).

table_columns.name: vat
table_columns.description: VAT amount applied to this line item.

table_columns.description: Identifier for the VAT code used in this line item.
